title: Ticket #879: Transferer detection params for SBIN
description:
AbstractReplicatorStateMachine.cpp:
   buffer = param( "TRANSFERER" );
   if ( NULL != buffer ) {
      m_transfererPath = buffer;
      free( buffer );
   }
   else {
      buffer = param( "SBIN" );
      if( !buffer ) {
         utilCrucialError(
            utilConfigurationError("SBIN","REPLICATION").Value());
      }
      else {
         m_transfererPath.sprintf( "%s/condor_transferer", buffer );
         free( buffer );
      }
   }

  • TRANSFERER should be defaulted and always present
  • Nothing should param for SBIN, ever
  • condor_transferer should be in LIBEXEC not SBIN

VERSION HISTORY: TRANSFERER is now provided by condor_config. The location of condor_transferer has been changed from SBIN to LIBEXEC.
